name: Paisible Soirée au Fil d'Étoiles
description:
Paisible Soirée au fil d'Étoiles (peaceful evening among the stars) is a soothing puzzle game set in the starry night.

Join stars together to restore constellations and navigate between them in the Sky Map.

Grab a cup of tea, huddle under your blanket and enjoy the journey among the stars ✨

This game was done for the GMTK Jam 2021.

Credits

A game by Sophie Anteunis, Sacha Chouery, Leo Lefebvre and Flavien Maucourt.

(@Mark the "b" is silent in "Lefebvre")
